Room.Name: Animal Keep
Room.ShortDescription: This is the animal keep, a compound for both exotic and domestic animals.
Room.LongDescription: A number of stalls have been setup and a training circle looks well-worn. There are small animal wagons lined up on one side, and bags of feed and piles of straw are on the other side of the compound. Gypsys are known as great animal trainers and this is apparently where much of that training takes place. Several of the great horses that pull the wagons are tethered at one end of the keep, and some very exotic animals are at the other end. The campground is to the east.
